Translations.Text: O vy shcho vvazhayete, vy budete daty dobrodiynistʹ z umov my daly vam, pered tym, yak denʹ prybuvaye de nemaye torhivli, niyakoho nepotism, ta niyakoho zastupnytstva. disbelievers yavlyayutʹ soboyu unjust

BOH: nemaye inshoho boha krim Yoho, Zhyvoho, Vichnoho. Nikoly moment unawareness abo slumber ne nazdohanyaye Yoho. Yomu nalezhytʹ vse u nebi ta vse na zemli. Khto intercede z Nym, krim u vidpovidnosti do Yoho mih bude? Vin znaye yikhniy mynulyy, ta yikhnye maybutnye. Niyakyy kozhnyy ne dosyahaye budʹ-yakoho znannya, krim tomu shcho Vin wills. Yoho dominion okhoplyuye nebo ta zemlyu, ta postanovu yim nikoly ne Yo tyahariv. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Vysoko, Velykyy

Tam bude niyakyy prymus u relihiyi: pravo shlyakh ye zaraz ne spivpadayuchyy z nepravylʹnym shlyakhom. Budʹ khto khto denonsuye chorta ta virytʹ v BOHU skhopyv naymitsnishu oblihatsiyu; shcho nikoly ne lamayetʹsya. BOH Slukhach, Omniscient

BOH Lord tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ; Vin vede yikh z temryavy u svitlo. Yak dlya tsykh khto disbelieve, yikhni lordy yikhni idoly; vony vedutʹ yikh z svitla u temryavu - tsyu budutʹ dwellers Pekla; vony perebuyutʹ u tse zavzhdy
